revision.text:
{{Wired embedded system |brand=LaCie |model=2Big |revision=Network 2 |upc=093053797836 |ean=3660619315079 |manuf_country=USA |is_manuf=No |price=400 |est_release_date=02/2010 |type=NAS |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.5 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Marvell |cpu1_model=88F6281 |cpu1_cspeed=1.2 GHz |fla1=512 KiB |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L4005A |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Hynix |ram1_model=HY5PS1G831CFP-S5 |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0, SATA II, eSATA |expansion_usb_num=2 |expansion_sata_num=3 |jtag=yes,, 20-pin header,, unpopulated,, J9 |serial=yes,, 8-pin header,, populated,, 3.3V TTL,, (115200 8N1),, J2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Marvell |eth_chip2_model=88E1116R |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=High Performance CPLD;Altera;EPM3064A;;1;,,, SATA II Port Multiplier;JMicron;JMB350;;1;,,, 512Kbit Serial Flash w/Dual Output SPI Bus;Chingis Tech;Pm25LD512;;1;,,, 4K I2C Serial EEPROM;Microchip;24LC04B;;1;,,, 3A, 28V, 1.4MHz Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP2365DN;;3;,,, PWM Fan Controller;GMT;G762;;1; |flags=eSATA, fan, metal case, power switch |stock_boot=U-Boot;1.1.4;Marvell 3.4.16; |stock_os=Linux;2.6.31.14;KW LSP 5.0.3; |oui_eth=00:D0:4B }} {{TagLine|LaCie 2Big Network 2}} :[https://www.lacie.com/support/network-storage/2big-network-2/ Support page]
"2Big-NAS-KW", "0901 750 Rev B" and "LaCie Group" :are silkscreened on the board.
{{See also|LaCie 2Big NAS|LaCie 2Big Network|LaCie}}
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Marvell]] 88F6281 ''Kirkwood'' @1.2GHz ARMv5 *Storage: 512KB (NOR) Flash, 2x SATA ports, :1 x eSATA port *Memory: 256MB (DDR2) @400MHz SDRAM *Network: 1x GbE port *USB: 1x USB 2.0 host, 1x USB 2.0 device ports *Power Source: 12V/4A via barrel
===Links=== *[https://www.pcworld.com/article/469412/lacie_2big_network_2_2tb_review_attractive_design_basic_function.html ''LaCie 2Big Network 2 2TB Review'' on '''PCWorld'''] *[http://lacie-nas.org/doku.php?id=2big_network_v2 ''Lacie 2big Network v2'' on '''LaCie NAS Wiki''']
==Images== <gallery> File:LaCie 2Big Network 2 Top.jpeg|Board top File:LaCie 2Big Network 2 Bottom.jpeg|Board bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
